34 
35 #include "ros/ros.h"
36 
37 #include "pilz_industrial_motion_planner/cartesian_limits_aggregator.h"
38 
39 static const std::string PARAM_CARTESIAN_LIMITS_NS = "cartesian_limits";
40 
41 static const std::string PARAM_MAX_TRANS_VEL = "max_trans_vel";
42 static const std::string PARAM_MAX_TRANS_ACC = "max_trans_acc";
43 static const std::string PARAM_MAX_TRANS_DEC = "max_trans_dec";
44 static const std::string PARAM_MAX_ROT_VEL = "max_rot_vel";
45 static const std::string PARAM_MAX_ROT_ACC = "max_rot_acc";
46 static const std::string PARAM_MAX_ROT_DEC = "max_rot_dec";
47 
48 pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianLimit
49 pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianLimitsAggregator::getAggregatedLimits(const ros::NodeHandle& nh)
50 {
51  std::string param_prefix = PARAM_CARTESIAN_LIMITS_NS + "/";
52 
53  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianLimit cartesian_limit;
54 
55  // translational velocity
56  double max_trans_vel;
57  if (nh.getParam(param_prefix + PARAM_MAX_TRANS_VEL, max_trans_vel))
58  {
59  cartesian_limit.setMaxTranslationalVelocity(max_trans_vel);
60  }
61 
62  // translational acceleration
63  double max_trans_acc;
64  if (nh.getParam(param_prefix + PARAM_MAX_TRANS_ACC, max_trans_acc))
65  {
66  cartesian_limit.setMaxTranslationalAcceleration(max_trans_acc);
67  }
68 
69  // translational deceleration
70  double max_trans_dec;
71  if (nh.getParam(param_prefix + PARAM_MAX_TRANS_DEC, max_trans_dec))
72  {
73  cartesian_limit.setMaxTranslationalDeceleration(max_trans_dec);
74  }
75 
76  // rotational velocity
77  double max_rot_vel;
78  if (nh.getParam(param_prefix + PARAM_MAX_ROT_VEL, max_rot_vel))
79  {
80  cartesian_limit.setMaxRotationalVelocity(max_rot_vel);
81  }
82 
83  // rotational acceleration + deceleration deprecated
84  // LCOV_EXCL_START
85  if (nh.hasParam(param_prefix + PARAM_MAX_ROT_ACC) || nh.hasParam(param_prefix + PARAM_MAX_ROT_DEC))
86  {
87  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Ignoring cartesian limits parameters for rotational "
88  "acceleration / deceleration;"
89  << "these parameters are deprecated and are automatically "
90  "calculated from"
91  << "translational to rotational ratio.");
92  }
93  // LCOV_EXCL_STOP
94 
95  return cartesian_limit;
96 }
